attributes.action: Print live free telephone number on all Goverment correspondence
attributes.additional_details: It would mean that anyone suffering Domestic abuse would have the number to ask for help.By having the number given to everyone you will access those that are housebound or who are living in fear
attributes.background: The live free telephone number printed on prescriptions and all Goverment correspondence so the number is accessible  to those suffering D/A

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's not clear what telephone number you want to be included on Government correspondence.

Find out how to get help if you or someone you know is a victim of domestic abuse: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/domestic-abuse-how-to-get-help
